name: Section 8: Prejudice - Frontier Colonies Map Pack
name_original: Section 8: Prejudice - Frontier Colonies Map Pack
description:
Section 8: Prejudice - Frontier Colonies Map Pack is an action-shooter game developed by TimeGate Studios. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by TimeGate Studios.
You can play Section 8: Prejudice - Frontier Colonies Map Pack on PlayStation 3 and PC.
